trans-unit.target: 你正在使用 版本的 Duplicati

trans-unit.source: Configure a new backup. Choose your destination, source data and schedule.
trans-unit.target: 通过选择目标位置、备份后端和调度计划以添加一个新的备份。

trans-unit.source: Import backup configuration from a file. During import, you can adjust the settings.
Are you sure you want to exit?

trans-unit.target: 运行命令行任务中... 中止
启动中... 已启动! 已完成! 已中止!

trans-unit.source: The backups will be split up into multiple files called volumes. Here you can set the maximum size of the individual volume files. Read more
trans-unit.target: 备份将被拆分为多个称为“卷”的小文件储存。此处用于设置单个卷所允许的最大文件大小。了解更多
arrow-right 立即运行 "" 命令
备份 的本地数据库

trans-unit.source: Each backup has a local database associated with it, which stores information about the remote backup on the local machine. This makes it faster to perform many operations, and reduces the amount of data that needs to be downloaded for each operation.
trans-unit.target: 每个备份都有一个与之关联的本地数据库，该数据库将远程备份的有关信息存储在本地计算机上。这使得许多操作的执行速度更快，并且减少了每次操作所需要下载的数据。

trans-unit.source: If the backup and the remote storage is out of sync, Duplicati will require that you perform a repair operation to synchronize the database. If the repair is unsuccessful, you can delete the local database and re-generate.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份无法与备份后端同步，Duplicati 将要求您执行修复操作以再次同步数据库。如果修复操作仍然无法成功，建议您删除本地数据库并重新生成。

trans-unit.source: Each backup has a local database associated with it, which stores information about the remote backup on the local machine. When deleting a backup, you can also delete the local database without affecting the ability to restore the remote files. If you are using the local database for backups from the commandline, you should keep the database.
If you want to use the backup later, you can export the configuration before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以后还想使用此备份，可以在删除之前先导出配置。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
Backup destination Connected check Test destination dots-three-verticallink Edit target URL
Current destination type . Want to select another? Click here
trans-unit.target: 当前备份后端类型 . 想要更换后端类型吗？ 点击更换

trans-unit.source: Be careful, this will overwrite everything you have in your destination.
trans-unit.target: 请小心填写，这将覆盖当前后端中的所有内容。
文件夹中包含备份数据

trans-unit.source: The remote destination already contains a backup. You must use a different folder for each backup.
trans-unit.target: 此远程后端中已经存在一个备份数据了。你必须为每一个备份选择不同的备份后端位置。

trans-unit.source: The remote destination is not empty. It is recommended to use an empty folder for the backup.
trans-unit.target: 远程后端地址不为空。强烈建议选择一个空文件夹储存备份数据。

trans-unit.source: Using double leading slashes is most likely wrong, and will result in objects being created with a leading slash in the name.
Store backups on your local file system.
The path to store the backup
Using double leading slashes makes the path absolute, pointing to the root of the filesystem.
This is a path to a private key file locally on the machine
Store backups in any S3 compatible bucket.
Store backups in Google Cloud Storage.
Store backups in Azure Blob Storage.
Store backups in B2 Cloud Storage.
Store backups in Microsoft Office 365 Group.
Store backups in OpenStack Object Storage.
Store backups in Sia Decentrilized Cloud.
Store backups in Storj Access Grant.
Store backups in Storj API Key.
Advanced options Add advanced option plus
Passwords must be at least characters long
trans-unit.target: 密码长度至少为 个字符
两次输入的密码不匹配
eye-slash 隐藏 eye 显示

trans-unit.source: check Copied password copy Copy password
trans-unit.target: check 密码已复制 copy 复制密码

trans-unit.source: Tip: Be sure to save your password. If you lose it, you will lose access to your backups.
Import backup configuration arrow-left Back download-simple Import
trans-unit.target: 导入备份设置 arrow-left 返回download-simple 导入

trans-unit.source: check Copied copy Copy to clipboard

trans-unit.target: 添加一个高级选项 plus

trans-unit.source: By adding this option it will override the matching global option
The chosen size is outside the recommended range. This may cause performance issues, excessively large temporary files or other problems.
trans-unit.target: 当前设置的文件大小超过建议的范围。这可能会导致性能瓶颈、过大的临时文件或者其它问题。

trans-unit.source: The backups will be split up into multiple files called volumes. Here you can set the maximum size of the individual volume files. Read more arrow-square-out
trans-unit.target: 备份将被拆分为多个称为“卷”的小文件储存。此处用于设置单个卷所允许的最大文件大小。 了解更多 arrow-square-out

trans-unit.source: Nothing will be deleted. The backup size will grow with each change.
trans-unit.target: 不会清理任何备份，备份大小将持续增长。

trans-unit.source: If at least one newer backup is found, all backups older than this date are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有新的备份，早于此日期的备份将会被删除。

trans-unit.source: Once there are more backups than the specified number, the oldest backups are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 一但备份版本的数目超过此值，最早的备份将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Over time backups will be deleted automatically. There will remain one backup for each of the last 7 days, each of the last 4 weeks, each of the last 12 months. There will always be at least one remaining backup.
trans-unit.target: 随着时间的增长，备份将被自动清理。同时保留最近一周中的所有备份，最近四个星期中每星期各一份备份，最近一年中每月各一份备份。此外，将保证至少存在一个备份。

trans-unit.source: Enter a retention strategy manually. Placeholders are D/W/Y for days/weeks/years and U for unlimited. The syntax is: 7D:1D,4W:1W,36M:1M. This example keeps one backup for each of the next 7 days, one for each of the next 4 weeks, and one for each of the next 36 months. This can also be written as 1W:1D,1M:1W,3Y:1M.
trans-unit.target: 请手动输入备份保留策略。占位符 D/W/Y 代表 日期/星期/年份，U 代表“永久”。例如策略 7D:1D,4W:1W,36M:1M，这个例子保留7天中每天一份，4个星期中每星期一份，36个月中每月一份，也可以写成以下形式 1W:1D,1M:1W,3Y:1M

trans-unit.source: Delete backups that are older than
trans-unit.target: 删除早于指定日期的备份

trans-unit.source: Keep a specific number of backups
If a date was missed, the job will run as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果错过了计划的时间，任务将尽快运行。

trans-unit.source: Add a path directly from your machine.
trans-unit.target: 直接添加本地机器中的路径

trans-unit.source: Choose if there’s any files you want to exclude.
The connection to the server is lost, attempting again in 0:
trans-unit.target: 与服务器的连接已丢失，将于 0: 之后重试

trans-unit.source: If you pause transfers they could time out and cause retries or failures.
trans-unit.target: 如果暂停文件传输，传输可能会超时，并导致重试或失败。
pause 暂停 play 启动
正在删除不需要的文件…
正在重新构建本地数据库…

trans-unit.source: Building list of files to restore …
trans-unit.target: 正在构建文件还原列表…
正在扫描已存在的文件…
正在使用本地文件块修补文件…
正在校验恢复后的文件…
正在列举不需要的远程文件…

trans-unit.source: Server is currently paused. Do you want to resume now?
trans-unit.target: 目前服务器已被暂停。是否恢复运行？

trans-unit.source: We will round bits to the nearest byte value.
The remote destination folder does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 远程后端中的文件夹不存在。

trans-unit.source: The remote destination folder does not exist, do you want to create it?
trans-unit.target: 远程后端中缺失所需的文件夹，是否创建一个？

trans-unit.source: The remote destination folder could not be created.
trans-unit.target: 无法在远程后端中创建文件夹

trans-unit.source: The remote destination folder was created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 已成功在远程后端中创建文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The server is using a certificate that is not trusted. If this is a self-signed certificate, you can choose to trust this certificate. The server reported the certificate hash:
trans-unit.target: 该主机正在使用未被信任的证书。 如果这是一个自签名的证书，你可以选择将其添加至信任清单中。 该证书的哈希文本为:

trans-unit.source: No certificate was specified, please verify that the reported host key is correct:
trans-unit.target: 未指定证书，请验证报告的主机密钥是否正确:

trans-unit.source: The host key has changed, please check with the server administrator if this is correct, otherwise you could be the victim of a MAN-IN-THE-MIDDLE attack. Do you want to REPLACE your CURRENT host key with the REPORTED host key: ?
trans-unit.target: 主机密钥已发生变化，请与服务器管理员确认其是否正确， 否则你可能正在经历中间人攻击。 确认将当前的主机密钥 替换为: 吗？

trans-unit.source: Backups are stored in the cloud and can be restored at any time.
trans-unit.target: 备份将储存在云端，并且能够随时恢复。

trans-unit.source: Restores allow you to restore your data from the cloud.
trans-unit.target: 从云端恢复你的备份数据。

trans-unit.source: {VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {No version yet} =1 {1 Version} other { Versions}}

Duplicati needs to be secured with a passphrase and a random passphrase has been generated for you. If you open Duplicati from the tray icon, you do not need a passphrase, but if you plan to open it from another location you need to set a passphrase you know. Do you want to set a passphrase now?
trans-unit.target: Duplicati 需要使用密码保护数据，并且已为您生成了一个随机的密码。 如果您从托盘图标直接打开 Duplicati，则不需要记住该密码，但如果您计划从其他它位置打开，则需要设置一个您知道的密码。想要现在设置一个吗？

trans-unit.source: Password have to be filled and have to match
trans-unit.target: 必须输入密码并且重复输入相同的内容

trans-unit.source: You have successfully logged out your being redirected to login page.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功退出登录，接下来将重定向至登录页面。

trans-unit.source: If the backup file was not downloaded automatically, right click and choose "Save as …"
The backup is missing, has it been deleted?
trans-unit.target: 该备份已丢失，是否已被删除？

trans-unit.source: The backup was temporary and does not exist anymore, so the log data is lost
trans-unit.target: 这是已经被删除的临时备份，因此没有日志数据

trans-unit.source: Where do you want to restore files to?
trans-unit.target: 您想把文件恢复到哪里？

trans-unit.source: How do you want to handle existing files?
trans-unit.target: 您想怎样处理已存在的文件？

trans-unit.source: Save different versions with timestamp in file name
trans-unit.target: 保留不同的版本，并在文件名称中添加时间戳
输入备份的密码 (若存在)

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading the backup filesets:
trans-unit.target: 加重备份文件时发生错误:

trans-unit.source: The remote storage is encrypted. Please enter the passphrase to access the backup.
trans-unit.target: 远程备份后端已加密。请输入密码以访问备份数据。

trans-unit.source: The backup storage folder was not found.
The backup storage folder does not contain any filesets.
trans-unit.target: 备份储存文件夹中不包含任何备份文件。

trans-unit.source: Restore from config arrow-left Back download-simple Restore
trans-unit.target: 从设置文件中恢复 arrow-left 返回 download-simple 恢复

trans-unit.source: Where do you want to restore from?
Machine is now registered, open this link to add it to your account:
trans-unit.target: 设备已注册，请打开此链接以将其添加到您的账户：

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete the remote control registration?
trans-unit.target: 确定要删除远程控制设置吗？

trans-unit.source: Select a language for the platform
trans-unit.target: 选择平台所使用的语言
允许远程访问 (需要重启)

trans-unit.source: By allowing remote access, the server listens to requests from any machine on your network. If you enable this option, make sure you are always using the computer on a secure firewall protected network.
trans-unit.target: 允许远程访问后，服务器将监听并允许来自你网络上任何机器的请求。启用此项后，请确保您的网络启用了安全防火墙保护。

trans-unit.source: To prevent various DNS based attacks, Duplicati limits the allowed hostnames to the ones listed here. Direct IP access and localhost is always allowed. Multiple hostnames can be supplied with a semicolon separator. If any of the allowed hostnames is an asterisk (*), all hostnames are allowed and this feature is disabled. If the field is empty, only IP address and localhost access is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 为了防止各种基于 DNS 的攻击，Duplicati 将仅允许此处列出的主机名访问。直接使用 IP 和 localhost 访问是始终允许的。可以使用分号分隔多个主机名，星号 (*) 代表允许所有主机名，同时禁用所有限制。如果该字段为空，则仅允许 IP 地址和 localhost 访问。
防止托盘图标自动登录

trans-unit.source: By default, the tray icon will open the user interface with a token that unlocks the user interface. This ensures that you can access the user interface from the tray icon, while requiring others to enter a password. If you prefer having to type in the password, even when accessing the user interface from the tray icon, enable this option.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，托盘图标将使用令牌直接打开用户界面，而不是登录页面。这确保能从托盘图标直接访问，同时要求其他人输入密码。如果您希望从托盘图标访问时也需要输入密码，请启用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Same as the base install version:
trans-unit.target: 与安装的来源渠道一致:

trans-unit.source: Try out the new features that we are working on. Currently the most stable version available. Test Restore data before using this in production environments.
trans-unit.target: 尝试我们正在开发的新功能。这是当前最稳定的版本。在生产环境使用前，请先测试恢复数据。

trans-unit.source: Specific builds for developers only. Not for use with important data.
trans-unit.target: 仅面向开发者的特定构建版本，不适用于处理重要的数据。

trans-unit.source: Individual builds for developers only. Not for use with important data.
trans-unit.target: 仅面向开发者的个别构建版本，不适用于处理重要的数据。

trans-unit.source: Duplicati will run when started, but will remain in paused state for the duration. Duplicati will occupy minimal system resources and no backups will be run.
trans-unit.target: Duplicati 将在启动后暂停一段时间，然后再开始允许。再次期间，Duplicati 会使用最小的系统资源，并且不会运行任何备份。

trans-unit.source: Usage reports help us improve the user experience and evaluate impact of new features. We use them to generate public usage statistics. All usage reports are sent anonymously and do not contain any personal information. They contain information about hardware and operating system, the type of backend, backup duration, overall size of source data and similar data. They do not contain paths, filenames, usernames, passwords or similar sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: 使用情况统计有助于帮助我们提升用户体验并评估新功能的影响。我们使用它们来生成 公开的使用情况统计数据。 所有的使用情况报告均以匿名的方式发送，并不包含任何个人信息。它们仅包含有关硬件和操作系统、后端类型、备份时长、源数据总大小以及其它类似数据的信息。它们不包含路径、文件名、用户名、密码或其它类似的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: Usage statistics, warnings, errors, and crashes
trans-unit.target: 使用情况统计、警告、错误和崩溃信息
